Package kodkod.engine.ucore

Contains strategies for minimizing unsatisfiable cores generated by SAT provers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BasicCRRStrategy A basic cnf-level CRR strategy.
CRRStrategy A skeletal implementation of the Complete Resolution Refutation algorithm for for producing locally minimal cores.
DistExtremumCRRStrategy A cnf-level CRR strategy that uses a distance heuristic to pick the clauses to be excluded from the core.
EmptyClauseConeStrategy A non-optimal minimization strategy based on the Empty Clause Cone algorithm.
FreqExtremumCRRStrategy A cnf-level CRR strategy that uses a frequency heuristic to pick the clauses to be excluded from the core.
HybridStrategy A hybrid strategy for generating unsat cores that are minimal at the logic rather than CNF level.
NaiveStrategy A naive minimization strategy that tests the presence of each clause in the core by simply re-solving {core} - {clause}.
 

Package kodkod.engine.ucore Description

Contains strategies for minimizing unsatisfiable cores generated by SAT provers.

Package Specification

Contains implementations of various strategies for minimizing unsatisfiable cores generated by SAT provers.

Related Documentation

See Also:
ReductionStrategy, SATProver
